name: Overlook Mansion
description:
"Overlook Mansion" is a short atmospheric horror game in which you'll help four girls to arrive safely until dawn

Four young girls are adopted by a rich lady who lives alone in a large and creepy mansion. But the happiness of leaving the orphanage will soon be replaced by terror


GRAPHICS

Ripped from Clock Tower: The First Fear (PlayStation) by MegamanEXE95

AUDIO

CrEEP by TokyoGeisha

Dark Intro by Nikke

Horror Game Menu by Eric Matyas

Mysterious by Nene

Sound FX from Freesound
